alert.note: Alert for Southwest San Juan Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 22 at 2:08AM MST until December 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches with locally higher amounts of 18 or more inches possible on south-facing slopes. The heaviest snow will fall this evening and overnight with rates exceeding 2 inches per hour at times. * WHERE...Southwest San Juan Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
